algorithm_technique: Monotone Chain Algorithm for Convex Hull
problem_summary_simple: Find all trees on the perimeter of the smallest fence enclosing all trees.
problem_summary_technical: Compute the convex hull of given points using the Monotone Chain algorithm to identify boundary points.
key_insights: The problem is equivalent to finding the convex hull of the given points.
The Monotone Chain algorithm efficiently constructs the convex hull by building lower and upper hulls separately.
The cross product is crucial for determining the orientation of three points to decide whether to include a point in the hull.
